about_the_game:
The B-Side Soundtrack for I Wani Hug That Gator, featuring the talent of several CC0 artists!

Tracks included:
01. 4 (jazz) (Chill 2 theme)
02. High on Loungin' (General theme)
03. SUPER METAL (Angry theme)
04. Hyper Staying (Awkward theme)
05. Even After All These Years (Casual theme)
06. Ramen (Slow theme)
07. Unwind (Misc theme)
08. Traveling in your mind (Trouble theme)
09. Far and High (Melancholy - Olivia theme)
10. I care (Chill 1 theme)
11. You're no good but I love you (Calm 1 theme)
12. Busted Jazz (Upbeat theme)
13. Everything You Ever Dreamed (Chill 3 theme)
14. Talentuous and Shy (Pissed theme)
15. Protect (Introspective 3 theme)
16. Stargazer (Melancholy 2 theme)
17. Rock music (Rock theme)
18. Finding Yourself (Lounge theme)
19. A Small Town On Pluto (Happy 2 theme)
20. Dreaming of you (Calm 2 theme)
21. Chills (Chill - Thinking theme)
22. Lightbull (Melancholy - Introspective theme)
23. Americana (Damien's theme)
24. Space! (Iadakan's theme)
25. Punk (Mia's theme 1)
26. Grunge (Mia's theme 2)
27. Icar fell (Ben's theme)
28. lovepartyinjapan (Arcade 1 theme)
29. 21seiki techno shonen (Arcade 2 theme)
30. People are spinning (Melancholy - Olivia theme)
31. Dancing (Mall theme)
32. Ocean (Boutique theme)

legal_notice: All tracks in this release are covered under the Creative Commons 1.0 Universal or the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International. Attribution to specific song's sources may be found in "tracks.txt" supplied with the music.
